description: syscall: prefer PATH environment variable in bootstrap scripts

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go
This sounds reasonable, which systems have you found the default perl to be insufficient ?

Perhaps It depends on package systems but NetBSD+pkgsrc, for example.


On Mon, May 20, 2013 at 7:17 PM,  <dave@cheney.net> wrote:
> This sounds reasonable, which systems have you found the default perl to
> be insufficient ?
>
> https://codereview.appspot.com/9575043/

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=9b75b7eb2191 ***
